title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's scope, objectives, and requirements for the underwater pipeline inspection system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Sensor Integration
description: Integrate various sensors (e.g., cameras, sonar, leak detectors) into the AUV for pipeline inspection and maintenance.

title: Implement Navigation and Control Systems
description: Develop navigation and control systems for the AUV to navigate underwater and follow pipelines.

title: Build Data Processing and Analysis
description: Implement data processing and analysis algorithms to interpret sensor data and detect pipeline anomalies or issues.

title: Develop User Interface and Visualization
description: Create a user interface and data visualization tools for operators to monitor the AUV and pipeline inspection data.

title: Implement Communication and Data Transfer
description: Establish communication protocols and data transfer mechanisms between the AUV and the control station.

title: Conduct System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all system components and perform comprehensive testing, including simulations and field trials.

title: Deploy and Maintain the System
description: Deploy the underwater pipeline inspection system and establish maintenance procedures and protocols.

title: Ensure System Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Create Documentation and User Manuals
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user manuals, system architecture diagrams, and technical specifications.
